headline: A Stretch and a Status Symbol
abstract: Is it the next Pilates? Can it make you taller? Our columnist booked a session.
lead_paragraph: Resolving to get in shape in the new year is an exhausting clich√©, as is the fact that no one sticks to the resolve. There are people who are so motivated to exercise that they keep up their jogging or weight lifting routines year-round. And then there is everyone else, a group I fall into.
